hero.title: Discover the Essence of Indian Flavors at SALT
hero.subtitle: As an authentic Indian Restaurant Bar & Grill, SALT invites you to savor exquisite cuisine, craft cocktails, and an unforgettable dining experience in a vibrant atmosphere.

about.title: The SALT Story: A Culinary Journey
about.paragraph1: At SALT - Indian Restaurant Bar & Grill, our passion is to bring the vibrant and diverse flavors of India to your plate. We meticulously craft each dish using traditional recipes and the freshest ingredients, ensuring an authentic taste that transports you straight to the heart of India.
about.paragraph2: Beyond exceptional food, SALT offers a dynamic bar and grill experience. Itâ€™s a place where friends and family gather, where every meal is a celebration, and where our warm hospitality makes you feel right at home. Join us at SALT for an evening of culinary delight and cherished moments.
